questionTitle: An overtaking driver cut ________ so suddenly that I had to brake hard to avoid a crash.
If he ________ a little harder, his results would be better.
Unexpectedly the lights ________ out and we were left in darkness.
I had no ________ that the divorce rate was so high in this country.
I don't think he'll ever ________ the shock of his wife's death.
________ Mrs Webber is over seventy, she still goes swimming every day.
In today's newspaper it ________ that oil has been discovered off the west coast.
There is a large car-park ________ to the station.
The hotel room was so dirty that I was ________ and complained to the manager.
________ from anything else, she is always late for work.
You must keep your dog on a ________ in this park.
The Queen has said that she will ________ the ceremony.
I'm not sure if the new tax is ________ a good idea after all.
She was quite unprepared ________ the news.
We have embarked ________ a new scheme.
And what does this delightful drink consist ________?
________ we had to stand.
anwers: there having been no seats left

questionTitle: He refused to give up work, ________ he'd won a million pounds.
We believe that the cumulative effects of renewed prosperity will ________ expectations.
It's distressing to see small children ________ in the streets.
